src:
Hasil Pertandingan Liverpool vs KRC Genk: Skor 2-1
06 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool sukses mengalahkan KRC Genk dengan skor tipis 2-1 dalam laga matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions 2019-20 yang dihelat di Anfield, Rabu (6/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Dua gol kemenangan Liverpool masing-masing diciptakan oleh Georginio Wijnaldum dan Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, sedangkan Genk sempat menyamakan skor lewat aksi Mbwana Samatta.
Berkat hasil ini, Liverpool berhak naik ke posisi puncak klasemen Grup E dengan poin 9, menggeser Napoli yang bermain imbang 1-1 melawan Salzburg. Sementara itu, Genk makin terbenam di dasar klasemen dengan perolehan satu poin.

Simak ulasan pertandingan selengkapnya di bawah ini.
text:
Liverpool vs KRC Genk results: Score 2-1
Nov 6 2019, 5:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Liverpool successfully beat KRC Genk with a thin score of 2-1 in the fourth matchday match of the 2019-20 Champions League group phase held at Anfield on Wednesday (11/06/2019) early morning hrs.
Liverpool's two winning goals each were created by Georginio Wijnaldum and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, while Genk had evened the score through the action of Mbwana Samatta.
Thanks to these results, Liverpool have the right to rise to the top of Group E with 9 points, shifting Napoli who drew 1-1 against Salzburg. Meanwhile, Genk increasingly immersed at the bottom of the standings with the acquisition of one point.

Check out the full match review below.
